name: Lesser Evils
description:
Compete with your friends to get to the end of the board first.

This game should be played with a separate voice chat enabled.

Instructions

- Two cards will appear, each with an unpleasant indignity on them. The player who turn it is should write down on paper, which they consider the lesser of the two evils. They will not reveal this to the other players.

- The remaining players will then discuss which option they think the first player has chosen and select this from the two cards by clicking on it.

- The player then reveals what their choice was and clicks on the card they selected.

- If this group guessed correctly, they move foward 1 space. If the group guessed incorrectly, the player moves forward 2 spaces.

-The first to reach the end wins.
